name: Roxanne Hart
description:
What's the best movie about kilt-wearing Scotsmen? Let's figure it out with the help of a handy chart!


"Braveheart""Highlander"
DirectorMel GibsonRussell Mulcahy
Advantage: Highlander. We have no idea who Mulcachy is, but at least he is not a raging antisemite.
StarMel GibsonChristopher Lambert
Advantage: Highlander. Lambert's accent is more believable. Also: see above.
Love InterestSophie MarceauRoxanne Hart
Advantage: Braveheart. If only Roxanne was Jewish... Whatever happened to her anyway?
Historical AccuracyAttemptedNot attempted
Advantage: Highlander. Ius Primae Noctis, Mel? Damn the legacy of King Edward!
BeheadedMel GibsonVarious
Advantage: Braveheart. Truly the best part of the film.
Time TravelNoYes
Advantage: Highlander. Duh.
Sean ConneryNoYes
Advantage: Highlander. Wow, this one is a landslide!
